member.name: Windows.isOOBEComplete
member.summary: Determines whether OOBE (Windows Welcome) has been completed.
member.param: Pointer to a variable that will receive the completion of OOBE upon success.
member.returns: TRUE if the OOBE completion state was successfully set. Otherwise,FALSE if OOBE completion state was not set. If FALSE, will retrieve extended error information.

member.name: Windows.RegisterWaitUntilOOBECompleted
member.summary: Registers a callback to be called once OOBE (Windows Welcome) has been completed.
member.param: Pointer to an application-defined callback function that will be called upon completion of OOBE. For more information, see OOBE_COMPLETED_CALLBACK.
Pointer to the callback context. This value will be passed to the function specified by OOBECompletedCallback. This value can be null.
Pointer to a variable that will receive the handle to the wait callback registration.
member.returns: TRUE if the routine successfully registered the callback. Otherwise, FALSE is returned. If FALSE, will retrieve extended error information.

member.name: Windows.UnregisterWaitUntilOOBECompleted
member.summary: Unregisters the callback previously registered via RegisterWaitUntilOOBECompleted.
member.returns: TRUE if the callback was successfully unregistered. Otherwise, FALSE is returned. If FALSE, will retrieve extended error information.
